extensionDescription.message: This extension opens predefined websites on click, and closes non-listed domains on double-click.

reverseExplanationOn.message: When reversed, double-clicking will close all tabs for domains and subdomains listed above.

reverseExplanationOff.message: When not reversed, double-clicking will close all tabs that are not in the list above.

tutorialText.message: One click to open all listed websites. Double click to close all tabs that are not listed.
